title: Ballysillan Swifts F.C.
text:
Ballysillan Swifts Football Club is an amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club from <a href="Belfast">Belfast</a> in <a href="Northern%20Ireland">Northern Ireland</a>.
The First Team plays in Division 2A of the <a href="Northern%20Amateur%20Football%20League">Northern Amateur Football League</a>, and the Reserves in Division 3D. The Under 23 (3rd) team plays in the <a href="Ballymena%20%26amp%3B%20Provincial%20Football%20League">Ballymena & Provincial Football League</a>. Home venue for the all the teams is Ballysillan Playing Fields.
The junior teams compete in the South Belfast Youth League.
